summary: Cancel mailing order with given identifier
description: Cancel given direct mailing order with the identifier.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the circular mailing order.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the receiver id on the platform.

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: Email identifier of the user on the platform.

404.description: The supplied mailing order identifier is invalid, the action is rolled back.
